name: Tense Night
description:
This game is for to two players just versus with the tanks to the game. then is for this is game is very entertaining.

You should come here and try play its game, but that will become dificult dont let to play for much time.

Controls Action Player 1 Player 2 Forward W Up arrow Backward S Down arrow Rotate to clockwise D Right arrow Rotate to anti-clockwise A Left arrow Primary weapon Space Enter Secondary weapon Ctrl Backspace Note

This is a two player tanks game, made with *Game Maker: Studio* following the *chapter 10* of *The game Maker´s apprentice* book
